markdown:
**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 265 **Domain** [Dust](/Domains.aspx?ID=107) **Range** 60 feet **Target** 1 creature **Defense** Fortitude **Duration** varies --- Dry winds dehydrate a creature. The target must attempt a Fortitude save; if used on a creature that has the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) trait or a creature made primarily of liquid (such as many [oozes](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=453)), the creature uses the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as [earth elementals](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=409)) are immune to parch. If a creature affected by _parch_ drinks a liquid, such as a swig of water or a potion, the spell ends. Affected creatures that have the water trait or are made primarily of liquid, as well as affected creatures that can’t drink, can end the effect as a two-action activity, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561) trait. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target takes a –1 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 round.
**Failure** The target takes a –1 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** The target takes a –2 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 minute and is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) as long as it has this penalty. --- **Heightened (4th)** You can target up to 4 creatures.
name: Parch

text: Parch Two Actions Source Divine Mysteries pg. 265 Domain Dust Range 60 feet Target 1 creature Defense Fortitude Duration varies --- Dry winds dehydrate a creature. The target must attempt a Fortitude save; if used on a creature that has the water trait or a creature made primarily of liquid (such as many oozes), the creature uses the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as earth elementals) are immune to parch. If a creature affected by parch drinks a liquid, such as a swig of water or a potion, the spell ends. Affected creatures that have the water trait or are made primarily of liquid, as well as affected creatures that can’t drink, can end the effect as a two-action activity, which has the concentrate trait. Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success The target takes a –1 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 round. Failure The target takes a –1 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 minute. Critical Failure The target takes a –2 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 minute and is dazzled as long as it has this penalty. --- Heightened (4th) You can target up to 4 creatures.
